inputs.remark:
缺少V5 （手术） V6 （术后三个月follow up）
V2 History描述错误："follow-up"应为"new referral from PCP"；缺少cVEMP潜伏期数据（P1: 13-15ms, N1: 21-24ms）；缺少cVEMP波形极性说明；缺少post-headshake nystagmus记录；缺少CT右侧对照描述

logic_summary: Corrected V2 history to reflect new referral from PCP.
Added missing post-headshake nystagmus negative finding to V3 VNG.
Added missing cVEMP latency data and waveform polarity description to V3 cVEMP.
Added description of intact right side (control) to V4 CT findings.
Added V5 (Surgery) and V6 (3-month follow-up) encounters based on Outcome section.

patch_ops.value: New referral from primary care physician.
Normal oculomotor, positional, and caloric results. No significant unilateral weakness or directional preponderance. No post-headshake nystagmus was noted.

Responses present bilaterally. Left amplitude larger than right, but asymmetry ratio calculated as normal. Presence of cVEMP despite conductive hearing loss is the critical diagnostic indicator. Waveform polarity: P1 negative/downward, N1 positive/upward.
Revealed dehiscence (absence of bone) overlying the left superior semicircular canal. The right superior semicircular canal showed intact overlying bone.

tests.name: Plugging Procedure
tests.key_findings: Underwent plugging procedure for left SSCD and received vestibular therapy.

tests.name: Follow-up Evaluation
tests.key_findings: Reported marked improvement in vertigo, hyperacusis, and pulsatile tinnitus.
